alert.note: Alert for Grant; Roberts (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 1:56PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Big Stone, southeastern Roberts and northeastern Grant Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 254 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Lagoona Beach to near Bellingham. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. SDDOT site indicated gust of 46 mph northeast of Milbank at 247 PM. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Correll around 310 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Artichoke. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
